<Text: The Never Land Books or Never Land Adventures are a series of short chapter books set in Never Land, the home of Peter Pan.>

Text: Never Land Books:  They are based on the situations and characters established in the novel "Peter and the Starcatchers" and its sequels.

Text: Never Land Books:  Although five books were planned, only three were published, in 2006–2008.

Text: Never Land Books:  The stories focus on supporting characters from the novels, such as the Indians, mermaids, pirates, and Lost Boys.
